text: Hello! My name is Alexander Marasco, I am a Computer Science graduate and software engineer/developer that enjoys creating technological solutions. I am a self-motivated contributer and leader with a wide range of technical experience. I have the knowledge to work full stack within an agile development team or on my own. Along with my knowledge includes soft skills in communicating solutions to customers and business-side leaders. I have interests in any kind of development, where it be for web, desktop, mobile, or anything in between. This website is a way for me to quickly showcase some of that interest, as well as to make it more interesting for someone to learn more about me.
